setup(datacrawler, mode='train', batch_size=32, instance=6, workers=8)¶

Setup the data generator.

Parameters

  • workers (int) – Number of workers to use during data retrieval/loading

  • datacrawler (ReidDataCrawler) – A DataCrawler object that has crawled the data directory

  • mode (str) – One of ‘train’, ‘test’, ‘query’.

generators.ClassedGenerator module¶

class generators.ClassedGenerator.ClassedGenerator(preload='', gpus=1, i_shape=(128, 128), normalization_mean=0.5, normalization_std=0.5, normalization_scale=0.00392156862745098, h_flip=0.0, t_crop=False, rea=False, **kwargs)¶

Bases: object

ClassedGenerator returns images only for the specified classes

setup(datacrawler, mode='train', batch_size=32, workers=8, preload_classes=[])¶

Setup the data generator.

Parameters

  • workers (int) – Number of workers to use during data retrieval/loading

  • datacrawler (ReidDataCrawler) – A DataCrawler object that has crawled the data directory

  • mode (str) – One of ‘train’, ‘test’, ‘query’.
